method: Put the mustard, honey, garlic, balsamic and cider vinegar in a food processor and whiz together. With the motor still running, pour the oil in through a funnel. Season with salt and pepper and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp French mustard,  1 tbsp honey,  1 clove garlic, peeled and crushed,  1 tsp balsamic vinegar,  2 tbsp cider vinegar,  6 tbsp sunflower oil,  salt and pepper, to taste
